title: [Maintenance] 2026-01-31 - Homelab
body:
# [Maintenance] 2026-01-31 - Homelab

## Status

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| **Overall Status** | YELLOW |
| **Last Updated** | 2026-01-31 11:05 CST |
| **Source Report** | reports/status-report-2026-01-31.md |
| **Assigned To** | gitea_admin |

---

## Context Pack

### Cluster Identity

| Component | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| K3s Version | v1.33.6+k3s1 |
| Client Version | v1.35.0 |
| Node Count | 10 (3 masters, 7 workers) |
| ArgoCD Apps | 40 total |
| Ceph Status | HEALTH_WARN (2 OSDs stalled read) |

### Current Health Evidence (Snapshot)

#### Metal Layer
| Check | Status | Details |
|-------|--------|---------|
| Nodes | GREEN | 10/10 Ready |
| Node Versions | GREEN | All v1.33.6+k3s1 |
| CNI (Cilium) | GREEN | 10/10 pods Running |

#### System Layer
| Check | Status | Details |
|-------|--------|---------|
| CoreDNS | GREEN | 1/1 Running |
| Metrics Server | GREEN | 1/1 Running |
| ArgoCD | GREEN | 7/7 pods Running, 40 apps Synced+Healthy |

#### Storage Layer
| Check | Status | Details |
|-------|--------|---------|
| Ceph Health | YELLOW | HEALTH_WARN (stalled reads) |
| OSDs | YELLOW | 7/7 up, 7/7 in (OSD.2, OSD.4 stalled) |
| Usage | GREEN | 35.10% (1.2 TiB used) |

#### Platform Layer
| Check | Status | Details |
|-------|--------|---------|
| Ingress-Nginx | GREEN | 1/1 Running |
| Certificates | GREEN | 25/25 Ready=True |

#### Apps Layer
| Check | Status | Details |
|-------|--------|---------|
| All Pods | GREEN | All Running or Completed |

### Observations

#### Ceph Stalled Reads (NEW)
- **OSD.2** (arcanine) and **OSD.4** (bulbasaur) reporting `DB_DEVICE_STALLED_READ_ALERT`.
- **Analysis**: Indicates slow/stalled I/O on the DB device (NVMe/SSD). Could be firmware, cable, or drive wear.
- **Status**: Cluster functional but at risk of latency spikes.

#### Node Activity (Persistent)
- **growlithe** (10.0.20.18): InvalidDiskCapacity warnings (Informational).

#### Renovate PRs
- **PR #54**: Non-major updates (Minor/Patch).
- **PR #55**: Renovate v46 (Major).

---

## Proposed Changes (Spec)

| ID | Type | Layer | Priority | Impact | Downtime | Summary | Dependencies |
|----|------|-------|----------|--------|----------|---------|--------------|
| S1 | FIX | Storage | P1 | High | Possible | Investigate/Resolve Ceph stalled reads on OSD.2/4 | None |
| R1 | UPDATE | Apps | P2 | Low | None | Merge PR #54: Non-major dependency updates | PR review |
| R2 | UPDATE | Platform | P2 | Medium | Possible restart | Merge PR #55: Renovate to v46 (major) | PR review, R1 |

---

## Execution Plan

### Ordering Rules
1. Process P0 ‚Üí P1 ‚Üí P2 ‚Üí P3
2. Within priority: Metal ‚Üí System ‚Üí Platform ‚Üí Apps
3. One change at a time with validation

### Validation Gate (After Each Change)

```bash
kubectl get nodes | grep -v "Ready" || true
kubectl get pods -n kube-system | grep -v "Running\|Completed" || true
kubectl get applications -n argocd | grep -v "Synced.*Healthy" || true
kubectl -n rook-ceph exec deploy/rook-ceph-tools -- ceph health
```

---

## Action Items (Tasks)

- [ ] **A0 P1**: Investigate Ceph stalled reads on OSD.2 and OSD.4
  - **Goal**: Identify cause of stalled reads and resolve (e.g., restart OSDs, check dmesg)
  - **Commands**: 
    ```bash
    # Check OSD logs
    kubectl -n rook-ceph logs -l ceph-osd-id=2 --tail=200
    kubectl -n rook-ceph logs -l ceph-osd-id=4 --tail=200
    # Restart OSD.2 (arcanine)
    kubectl -n rook-ceph rollout restart deploy/rook-ceph-osd-2
    # Restart OSD.4 (bulbasaur)
    kubectl -n rook-ceph rollout restart deploy/rook-ceph-osd-4
    ```
  - **Expected**: `ceph health` returns `HEALTH_OK` after restart/mitigation
  - **If fails**: Escalation required (Hardware check)
  - **Rollback**: N/A

- [ ] **A1 P2**: Review and merge PR #54 - Non-major dependency updates
  - **Goal**: Apply minor/patch dependency updates
  - **Commands**: 
    ```bash
    # Via Gitea UI: https://git.eaglepass.io/ops/homelab/pulls/54
    # Or via API:
    curl -X POST "https://git.eaglepass.io/api/v1/repos/ops/homelab/pulls/54/merge" \
      -H "Authorization: token $GITEA_TOKEN" \
      -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
      -d '{"Do":"merge"}'
    ```
  - **Expected**: ArgoCD apps remain Healthy
  - **Rollback**: `git revert <commit>`

- [ ] **A2 P2**: Review and merge PR #55 - Renovate to v46
  - **Goal**: Update Renovate bot to v46
  - **Commands**: 
    ```bash
    # Via Gitea UI: https://git.eaglepass.io/ops/homelab/pulls/55
    # Or via API:
    curl -X POST "https://git.eaglepass.io/api/v1/repos/ops/homelab/pulls/55/merge" \
      -H "Authorization: token $GITEA_TOKEN" \
      -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
      -d '{"Do":"merge"}'
    ```
  - **Expected**: Renovate pod restarts with v46
  - **Rollback**: `git revert <commit>`

---

## Change Log

| Timestamp | Action | User | Result |
|-----------|--------|------|--------|
| 2026-01-30 05:07 | Initial maintenance issue created | opencode | GREEN status confirmed |
| 2026-01-31 11:05 | Recon update: Ceph HEALTH_WARN detected | antigravity | Added P1 Ceph task, Status -> YELLOW |

---

## Closure (Filled by homelab-action)

### Completion Criteria:
- [ ] All action items completed or explicitly deferred
- [ ] All validation gates passed
- [ ] No regressions in cluster health
- [ ] Maintenance issue closed

**Final Status**: PENDING

**Closed By**: PENDING
**Closed Date**: PENDING

Read the [Dependency Dashboard](https://docs.renovatebot.com/key-concepts/dashboard/) docs to learn more. ## Repository Problems Renovate tried to run on this repository, but found these problems. - ‚ö†Ô∏è WARN: GitHub token is required for some dependencies - ‚ö†Ô∏è WARN: No github.com token has been configured. Skipping release notes retrieval ## Open The following updates have all been created. To force a retry/rebase of any, click on a checkbox below. - [ ] [chore(deps): update all non-major dependencies](pulls/54) (`grafana`, `kube-prometheus-stack`, `ollama`, `supabase/logflare`, `supabase/postgres`, `supabase/realtime`, `supabase/storage-api`) - [ ] [chore(deps): update helm release renovate to v46](pulls/55) - [ ] **Click on this checkbox to rebase all open PRs at once** ## PR Closed (Blocked) The following updates are blocked by an existing closed PR.
